name: Unfortunate Gladiator
description:
Controls:

WASD to move
MOUSE to aim
SPACE to throw

So there were a lot of firsts for me. I completed my first real game, i competed in a game jam my first time and i made my first game with godot. Still i put quite some work into this.

I would really appreciate some feedback from everyone! :)

This game is about an unfortunate gladiator for whom things go very wrong whenever he doesn't hit his target.

Edit: In Browser play does not seem to work. I still kept it here in case it just doesn't work for me. If anyone knows why it does not work, please tell me ^^ I am very inexperienced in Exporting and Uploading games as this is basically my first. 
Please just download the exe or x86_64 instead.

Edit: In Browser play works properly now!
